snippet: A federal judge denied a motion to dismiss Michael C. Skakel’s libel claim over comments made by Nancy Grace and her associates falsely suggesting that DNA evidence tied him to Martha Moxley’s 1975 killing.
abstract: Federal Judge Vanessa L Bryant rules that Michael C Skakel's libel claim can proceed against television personality Nancy Grace and her associates over comments made on her current affairs show that falsely suggested DNA evidence tied him to Martha Moxley's 1975 murder.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge denied a motion to dismiss Michael C. Skakel’s libel claim over comments made by Nancy Grace and her associates falsely suggesting that DNA evidence tied him to Martha Moxley’s 1975 killing.

headline.main: Ruling Clears Way for Skakel Libel Suit
headline.print_headline: Ruling Clears Way for Skakel Libel Suit
